mapper.select:
select
from purchase_project pp where pp.isNotice=1 and pp.isCexpert=0 and pp.purchaseprojcode in (select bb.purchaseprojcode from supp_bidding_record bb,tbl_members tm where tm.companycode=bb.Biddercode and tm.companycode=#{companycode,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
